plot: A documentary cinematic journey through arches, thoughts, windows and memories in the most-talked-about building in Brooklyn created by the artist, Arthur Wood.
title: Broken Angel: The Final Chapter
plot_es: A documentary cinematic journey through arches, thoughts, windows and memories in the most-talked-about building in Brooklyn created by the artist, Arthur Wood.
plot_en: A documentary cinematic journey through arches, thoughts, windows and memories in the most-talked-about building in Brooklyn created by the artist, Arthur Wood.
